text: The Bhagivant Koli (also spelled as Bhagiwant Koli) is a Clan (Gotra, Kutumb) of the Koli caste found in the Indian states of Maharashtra, Goa and Karnataka and the Union Territory of the Dadra and Nagar Haveli and nearby areas. The Bhagivant Kolis are divided into fourteen subclans and meaning of Bhagivant is fortunate (Bhagyasali). == References == == Other websites == *Mahadev Koli clans of Maharashtra Category:Koli clans
title: Bhagivant Koli
